org.openimaj.image.processing.convolution

Class Gaussian2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.processing.convolution.FConvolution
      • org.openimaj.image.processing.convolution.Gaussian2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageProcessor<FImage>, Processor<FImage>, SinglebandImageProcessor<Float,FImage>

    public class Gaussian2D
extends FConvolution
    Simple 2D Gaussian convolution. In most cases the FGaussianConvolve filter will do the same thing, but much much faster!
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
